name: RetroHitz
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: retro hits radio
des: Dive into the vibrant world of Retro Hitz, your ultimate online radio station dedicated to the unique sounds of the past. Immerse yourself in the groovy rhythms of 70's and 80's funk, where legendary basslines and soulful beats reign supreme. Experience the explosion of synthpop in the 80's, with its catchy melodies and futuristic sounds that defined an era. Tune in now to Retro Hitz and relive the magic of funk, synthpop, and more, as we bring you the timeless tracks that keep the dance floor alive!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
